name: MVPet's Github Page
body:
### Project G.F.T. and vENGINE A Prototype of Both Engine & Game,
Developed using C++, Boost and SDL library [http://mvpet.github.io/Project-G.F.T/](http://mvpet.github.io/Project-G.F.T/) ### Advance Wars EX A prototype Advance Wars fan game. Developed using C++ and SFML library. [http://mvpet.github.io/FEXAW](http://mvpet.github.io/FEXAW) ### MegaMan Battle Chip Challenge Battle Arena A prototype MegaMan Battle Network fan game with some gamplay adjustments. Developed using C# and Unity2D. [http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/](http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/) ### Buoyancy Simulation A scripted simulation used to educate Oceanography students about basic Buoyancy principles. Developed using C# and Unity3D. [http://itmsunity.github.io/OceanMovie](http://itmsunity.github.io/OceanMovie) ### Hunger Game A quiz based game used to educate Nutrition students about healthy eating choices. Developed using ActionScript3 and Flixel library. [http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating](http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
